price: আৰু যিসকলে আমাৰ আয়াতসমূহক অস্বীকাৰ কৰিছে, সিহঁতেই হৈছে দুৰ্ভগীয়া।
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
